Initialize¶

hive.initialize.initialize_fleet(vehicle_types, bases, charge_curve, whmi_lookup, start_time, env_params, clock)[source]¶

Initializes the fleet and the fleet_state matrix.

Parameters

  • vehicle_types (list) – list of vehicle types and number of vehicles for each type.

  • bases (list) – list of bases objects.

  • charge_curve (pd.DataFrame) – Dataframe containing a charge curve for all vehicles.

  • whmi_lookup (pd.DataFrame) – Dataframe containing a watt-hour per mile lookup for all vehicles.

  • env_params (dict) – dictionary of all of the constant environment parameters shared across the simulation.

  • clock (hive.utils.Clock) – simulation clock shared across the simulation to track simulation time steps.

Returns

  • veh_fleet (list) – list of all initialized vehicles

  • fleet_state (np.ndarray) – matrix that represents the state of the fleet. Used for quick numpy vectorized operations.

hive.initialize.initialize_stations(station_df, clock)[source]¶

Initializes stations list from DataFrame.

Parameters

  • station_df (pd.DataFrame) – DataFrame containing scenario vehicle station or base network

  • clock (hive.utils.Clock) – simulation clock shared across the simulation to track simulation time steps.

Returns

stations – list of initialized stations.

Return type

list
